Rule: Higher education (Masters, Doctorate, Bachelors, Prof-school) leads to higher income.
Sales, Professional, and White-Collar occupations lead to higher income.
Gender being Male leads to higher income.
Being widowed, as opposed to married, can potentially lead to higher income.
Being in a Government or Private workclass, combined with higher education, can lead to higher income.
Transitioning to a Service occupation, along with higher education, can lead to higher income.
Being of a different race (Other) in combination with higher education and other factors can potentially lead to higher income.
